title: Ravi Z, Cardinal McCarrick, the Crisis of Institutional Authority and Fatherhood among RC and Prot.
description:
Both Brett Salkeld and Kale Zelden have been on the channel. After my latest with Brett someone wanted to hear Brett and Kale talk. I thought it was a terrific idea. 

There's a real crisis in the church not just around sexuality but authority that has energized traditional Roman Catholics to complain about the institutional church. This is mediated in different ways among Protestants. Conversation of course went into Vatican II. This is a hot conversation you won't want to miss. Hard to summarize where all it went. 

My first conversation with Kale Zelden https://youtu.be/SOpxt-xFoBw
Kale's piece in 1 Peter 5 https://onepeterfive.com/things-are-broken-we-need-to-upgrade-our-sense-making-apparatus/
Kale on Twitter @kalezelden
Kale Zeldon and Rod Dreher Podcast https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzWMTd6--C7D-HvWFly-hiQ

Brett's links
Brett on Twitter @BrettSalkeld
Brett has a podcast https://archregina.sk.ca/thinkingfaith​
Website https://archregina.sk.ca/archdiocesan-theologian
Transubstantiation book on Amazon https://amzn.to/2uZVqeA​
His book on Purgatory https://amzn.to/32crfgt

Convo notes: 
Danger of the superstar pastor

It's going to hurt the work

"Jesus doesn't need your lie"

McCarrock

John Carape, fell

"the council" The Second Vatican Council

62-65

Hermeneutics of Continuity

Post WWII crisis in European Catholicism

The church's relationship with the world beyond the church

Rod Dreher Benedict Option

The balance between a robust Catholic identity and engagement with the world

False dichotomy

Liberals and the Trads

We no longer set the terms by which our own theology is discussed

Joe Biden goes to mass on Sundays

Now that we have a catholic president? What does that label even mean? 

Betsy De Vos

Mary Eberstadt open letter to Joe Biden

Glorification of Joe Biden the Catholic

How social media is seeping into people's lives

The algorithms are rewarding extreme behavior, the more extreme the content the more reactive

Taylor Marshall

Lack of a sense of agency: being able to not get a vaccine makes you feel like you're gaining control

What can we offer them to give them a sense of participation

Conspiracy theories work because they have explanatory power, nothing means nothing

Why things really stink now, and why, infiltration

No longer smells like the sheep he is called to shepherd

Subsidiarity

When I think of the Second Vatican Council, I don't really think of the Second Vatican Council

Baked in decadence

John Teal about Benedict's papacy

Justo Gonzales The Story of Christianity volumes 1 and 2

The Trad narrative: 

The Wanderer: Vat II Sceptic

Ravi Zach, Mcarron, Trads, Social Media, Hunger for the Salvation from all the plagues us

Joe Biden

Broken or non-existent relationships with their own fathers

Fight Club: the masculine spirit

We live in a society that has taken away all the fathers

Fatherhood

Role of the Bishop as a Father to his priests

Year of St. Joseph

JBP comedian Theo…
